queries.name: Find all Domain Admins
queries.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ {name} WITH n MATCH (n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Find all Domain Admins (German)
queries.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ {name} WITH n MATCH (n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins
Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins (German)
Find logged in admins
queries.query: MATCH p=(a:Computer)-[r:HasSession]->(b:User) WITH a,b,r MATCH p=shortestPath((b)-[:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(a)) RETURN b,a,r

queries.name: Find Top 10 Users with Most Sessions
queries.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH (m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Find Top 10 Computers with Most Sessions
queries.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH (m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Find Top 10 Users with Most Local Admin Rights
queries.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH (m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Find Top 10 Computers with Most Admins
queries.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH (m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership

nodeSelectQuery.onFinish: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.name ENDS WITH ('@' + {result}) WITH n MATCH (n)-[r:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE NOT m.name ENDS WITH ('@' + {result}) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Groups with Foreign Domain Group Membership

nodeSelectQuery.onFinish: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name ENDS WITH ('@' + {result}) WITH n MATCH (n)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group) WHERE NOT m.name ENDS WITH ('@' + {result}) RETURN n,r,m
